fullplot: Nell Bowen, the spirited protege of rich Lord Mortimer, becomes interested in the conditions of notorious St. Mary's of Bethlehem Asylum (Bedlam). Encouraged by the Quaker Hannay, she tries to bring support to reforming Bedlam, but the cruel Master Sims who runs it has her committed there. The inmates, however, have the last say.

title: Bedlam
writers: William Hogarth (suggested by The William Hogarth painting Bedlam Plate #8 "The Rake's Progress")
